patthana8.58:1.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.58:2.1: Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.58:3.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.58:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
